Articles.Content: Hello, a couple days ago I reinstaled KSP with some mods and I have some graphical issues with scatterer. When I am below 1km above the see and I look down, I can see some wierd white outlines around my ship. I don't understand, I looked on internet but I couldn't find any answer, do you have any idea what could do that? Those outlines seems to have the same shape as if I have no antialiasing. Thanks for reading and helping me! And sorry for my English...
